title: I-40 from Raleigh to Wilmington is always cluttered with trash, tires, car parts, dead animals, plastic bags, bottles, cans, etc.  It is a real eye sore in an otherwise beautifuland scenic drive.  Who is responsible for monitoring and cleaning this roadway?
